name: Gun vs Gun (Carl Williams)
description:
A game I made for Simple Jam #3!

You are the gun and you have to fire at your fellow guns because for some reason, they have gone rogue and are trying to find and kill you. This is your perfect opportunity to go rogue on your teammates and pull out the largest Uno reverse card in the history of gunkind.

NOTE: This is a jam game, so please expect for some bugs to exist in the game. In case of any issues, please let me know by explaining your issue in the comments section of the page. Feel free to inform me about anything that may be improved or anything related / unrelated to the game.
